trigger_prototype.name: Changed number of running VMs on {#HOSTLABEL}
Physical usage on SR {#SRLABEL} is over 90%
Virtual allocation on SR {#SRLABEL} is over 150%

item_prototype.name: {#VMLABEL} normalized vCPU usage
item_prototype.description: The cpu load normalized to the cpu number

trigger_prototype.name: {#VMLABEL} has more than 5 snapshots
trigger_prototype.description: Too much snapshot can be a problem, so we limit their number to 5.

trigger_prototype.name: {#VMLABEL} last full backup is older than one week
{#VMLABEL} last full snapshot is older than one day
{#VMLABEL} normalized CPU usage close to 100%
trigger_prototype.description: There could be at least one CPU close to 100%. Average on last three catches.

trigger.name: Free space in NFS backup mountpoint is below 20%
trigger.description: All checks are showing nfs mountpoint free space below 20% in the last 5 minutes

trigger.name: NFS mountpoint is not active
trigger.description: All checks are showing nfs mountpoint down in the last 5 minutes
